text: Strongylocoris is a genus of plant bugs belonging to the family Miridae.Funet ==Species== *Strongylocoris atrocoeruleus (Fieber, 1864) *Strongylocoris cicadifrons A. Costa, 1853 *Strongylocoris erythroleptus A. Costa, 1852 *Strongylocoris franzi Wagner, 1955 *Strongylocoris leucocephalus (Linnaeus, 1758) *Strongylocoris luridus (Fallén, 1807) *Strongylocoris niger (Herrich-Schaeffer, 1835) *Strongylocoris oberthuri Reuter, 1905 *Strongylocoris obscurus (Rambur, 1839) *Strongylocoris raimondoi Carapezza, 1991 *Strongylocoris seabrai Schmidt, 1939 *Strongylocoris steganoides (J. Sahlberg, 1875) Biolib ==References== Category:Miridae genera
title: Strongylocoris
